data.eml:eml: Notes on the species of Perkinsiana (Polychaeta: Sabellidae) from Antarctica with the description of P. brigittae sp. nov.

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tovar-Hernández, María Ana, Yáñez-Rivera, Beatriz, Giangrande, Adriana, Gambi, Maria Cristina (2012): Notes on the species of Perkinsiana (Polychaeta: Sabellidae) from Antarctica with the description of P. brigittae sp. nov. Zootaxa 3485: 56-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.282400
